LanguageData.Building_Heater.label: Estufa
LanguageData.Building_Heater.description: Una estufa que produce calor al quemar fuentes de combustible básico. Puede ser alimentado por leña, carbón vegetal, carbón mineral, turba o materiales derivados de la madera.
LanguageData.Building_Heater_Blueprint.label: stove (blueprint)
LanguageData.Building_Heater_Frame.label: stove (building)
LanguageData.Building_Heater_Frame.description: A stove that produces heat by burning basic fuel sources. Can be fueled by kindling, coal, charcoal, peat and wooden stuff.
LanguageData.EHeatedFloor.label: Suelo irradiante eléctrico
LanguageData.EHeatedFloor.description: Azulejos de pisos calentados que utilizan cables conductores y calefacción por convección para calentar una habitación.
LanguageData.EHeatedFloor_Blueprint.label: electric heated floor (blueprint)
LanguageData.EHeatedFloor_Frame.label: electric heated floor (building)
LanguageData.EHeatedFloor_Frame.description: Heated flooring tiles that utilize conductive wires and convection heating to warm a room.
LanguageData.ColdstoneBattery.label: Batería de PiedraFría
LanguageData.ColdstoneBattery.description: Un tanque construido para enfriar una habitación de tamaño medio por debajo de la congelación. Requiere piedra fría como combustible. Capaz de sostener un techo.
LanguageData.ColdstoneBattery_Blueprint.label: coldstone battery (blueprint)
LanguageData.ColdstoneBattery_Frame.label: coldstone battery (building)
LanguageData.ColdstoneBattery_Frame.description: A tank built to cool a medium-sized room to below freezing. Requires coldstone as fuel. Able to support a roof.
LanguageData.TemperatureGauge.label: Termómetro
LanguageData.TemperatureGauge.description: Muestra la temperatura ambiente actual y puede configurarse para proporcionar alertas basadas en la temperatura. No requiere electricidad.
LanguageData.TemperatureGauge_Blueprint.label: thermometer (blueprint)
LanguageData.TemperatureGauge_Blueprint_Install.label: thermometer (blueprint)
LanguageData.TemperatureGauge_Frame.label: thermometer (building)
LanguageData.TemperatureGauge_Frame.description: Displays the current ambient temperature and can be configured to provide temperature based alerts. Does not require power.
LanguageData.GH.label: Calentador geotérmico
LanguageData.GH.description: Un calentador geotérmico industrial que recoge y controla el calor de un géiser de vapor. Es auto-equilibrado y puede calentar un área interior grande a una temperatura cómoda.
LanguageData.GH_Blueprint.label: geothermal heater (blueprint)
LanguageData.GH_Frame.label: geothermal heater (building)
LanguageData.GH_Frame.description: A industrial geothermal heater that collects and controls the heat from a steam geyser. It is self-balanced and can heat up a large indoor area to a comfortable temperature.
LanguageData.MiningHelmetGlower.label: Casco con luz minero
